subject: Sales
title: Subject Lines That Get Opened
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Subject Lines That Get Opened.

hook.text: 'Quick question' in a subject line gets opened 50% more than 'Our amazing new solution' does.

buildup.text: The subject line decides every email's fate. Curiosity and brevity push open rates higher.

discovery.text: Research shows subject lines of six to ten words perform best. Shorter consistently beats longer.

twist.text: Clickbait subjects boost opens but destroy trust. The body must deliver what the subject promised.

climax.text: A/B test your subject lines. The gap between 20% and 40% open rates is often just a few words.

punchline.text: Three words in the subject line decide the email's fate.

quiz.question: What is the ideal length for an email subject line?
